mapper.select: select a.class_id, a.member_id, b.keyword_name as region_name, c.keyword_name as category_name, a.class_name, a.class_price, a.class_type, a.start_date, a.end_date, a.audit_status, a.audit_return from keyword b join classes a on a.region_id = b.keyword_id join keyword c on a.keyword_id = c.keyword_id
mapper.update: update classes set audit_status = #{auditStatus}, audit_return = #{auditReturn} where class_id = #{classId};
